sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react" import "./Info.css" export default class Info extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { type: -1 } this.changeType = this.changeType.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } changeType = (event) => { const type = parseInt(event.target.value) this.setState({ type: type }) } handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const { type } = this.state if (type !== -1) { const type = { type: type } this.sendCommand("type", type) } else { console.err("unknown submission") } } render() { let { isServerConnected,isPotConnected,humidity, tempurature,lightness,weight,ph,speaker,motor,waterpump1,waterpump2} = this.props return (
Connection State
Server: {isServerConnected ? "connected" : "disconnected"}
Pot: {isPotConnected ? "connected" : "disconnected"}
Plant Type
Type: 
Pot Sensor Reading
Dirt humidity: {humidity}
Tempurature: {tempurature}
Lightness: {lightness}
Weight: {weight}
pH Value: {ph}
Utility State
Speaker: 100%
Gear and Motor: {motor ? "Operating" : "Stopped"}
Water Pump 1: {waterpump1 ? "Operating" : "Stopped"}
Water Pump 2: {waterpump2 ? "Operating" : "Stopped"}
) } }
